hero.title: xMatix Warranty

hero.description2: xMatix Warranty helps organizations manage warranty execution from claim intake to settlement with governed workflows, real time validations, and complete traceability

cardsData.title: The problem
cardsData.content: Warranty processes are often manual, inconsistent, and fragmented across service, inventory, and finance systems.
list: Fraud and duplicate claims go unnoticed

cardsData.title: The xMatix Approach
cardsData.content: xMatix Warranty standardizes how warranty claims are validated, approved, and settled so every claim follows the same governed execution process.
